Read input data from a file path

Source: R/utils.R
read_input_file.Rd

Reads data from the specified file path. Supports RDS, CSV, TSV, and TXT formats. Returns a data.frame or a GRanges object if RDS contains GRanges.

Usage

read_input_file(path)

Arguments

path

Character string of the file path to read.

Value

The contents of the file, either a data.frame, GRanges, or other R object saved in the RDS.

On this page
